title: Differences in the experience of cultural ecosystem services in mountain protected areas by clusters of visitors
content:
Publication date: December 2024

Source: Ecosystem Services, Volume 70

Author(s): María R. Felipe-Lucia, Ángel de Frutos, Emilie Crouzat, Volker Grescho, Jonna M. Heuschele, Melissa Marselle, Marco Heurich, Franziska Pöpperl, Florian Porst, Ana Paula Portela, Christian Rossi, Claudia Carvalho-Santos, Ana Stritih, Ana Sofia Vaz, Aletta Bonn
